Summary: Yellow glowing crescent cloaking or behind cloud
divs: Sighting DetailsAt home 800 block San Pedro near gaffey and freeway entrance to either 110 or 47 yo LBC. looked out window saw glowing light, I first thought might be moon, it was not it was a separate entitiy cloaking as cloud and sending what I believe is healing light to the ones (either person or planet) below, slowly pulsating light and in my opinion healing light.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around September 1st 2013
